description: Full approval of details pursuant to conditions LW8 (foundation depths of trees), LW9 (landscaping Blocks 6,7,8), LW10 (landscaping Blocks 1,2,3) and partial approval of LW11 of planning permission ref: P03/1788 approved on 23 October 2003 of planning permission ref: P01/1501 approved on 30 May 2002. Details of samples and materials of the Piper Close landscaping scheme have not been formally agreed by the Local Planning Authority and require approval as a part of condition LW11.
site_name: Land At Ringcross Estate West Side Of Lough Rd
decision_conditions: Details and samples of enclosures including types, dimensions and treatment of walls, fences, screen walls, barriers, rails, retaining walls and hedges, hard ground surfaces including kerbs, edges, rigid and flexible paving, unit paving, driveways, steps and, if applicable, synthetic surfaces to be used within the development shall be submitted and agreed to by the Local Planning Authority prior to completion of the proposal as required by condition LW11.
